ChannelManager Allows access to the current microscope channel settings.

Class Summary
DeviceSettingDTO Setting for a device property.
 

Enum Summary
DeviceType Types of devices of a microscope.
PropertyType The type of a property.
 

Exception Summary
DeviceException An exception thrown if a device or device property is requested that is unknown.
MicroscopeConfigurationException Exception thrown when a microscope configuration file contained errors.
MicroscopeDriverException Exception thrown when having problems with the drivers of the microscope.
MicroscopeException Class representing an exception which occurred in the execution of some microscope tasks.
MicroscopeLockedException  
SettingException An exception thrown if a requested setting is undefined or a provided setting is invalid.
